channel.title: Mohamed Saad Ibn Seddik
channel.description: Recent content on Mohamed Saad Ibn Seddik

item.title: Who am I?
item.description:
My name is Mohamed Saad Ibn Seddik. I am passionate about science and technology for as long as I can remember. I have an engineering degree in Robotics and a Ph.D. in Autonomy and Localization for Underwater Vehicles.

Currently, I am working as a postdoctoral researcher at MIT. I set up the game mechanics for a human-robot competition Aquaticus. The idea is to have humans and robots play as teammates a capture the flag game. I am also developing an online course for students, and curious individuals in general, to learn about the the MOOS robotics middleware.

I am interested in software architecture for robotics, autonomous vehicles, machine learning, artificial intelligence and interval analysis.
